rules_text:
Suspend 1 {1}{U}{R} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U}{R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Ionic Warp deals 3 damage to each creature your opponents control.
flavor_text: [i]“Glad I wasn't holding that ionic spell scroll...” - Seroan Wizard[/i]
